steps.step-1: Stand straight with your face facing straight

steps.step-2: Bend your knees at an angile of 30deg

steps.step-3: Place one of your foot backward as shown in the figure

steps.step-4: Raise your hand above your head

steps.step-5: Lean backwards as you sit down on your knees

steps.step-1: Sit on the ground with your legs extended

steps.step-2: Make an angle above 90deg with your legs spread

steps.step-3: Sit straight and lean forward with your hands extended

steps.step-4: Go back to the initial position

steps.step-3: Hold hands behind your back and extend to your shoulder level

steps.step-4: Bring back to the initial position

steps.step-5: Repeat the steps slowly relaxing shoulder joints

steps.step-1: Lay on the ground facing the roof

steps.step-2: Relax and raise your leg upwards without bending your knees

steps.step-3: Grand your thighs and hold back

steps.step-4: You can feel a strech on your hamstrings

steps.step-5: Bring back to the initial position

steps.step-1: Stand on the ground on your knees

steps.step-2: Straighten your back on relaxed position

steps.step-3: Breathe out and extend your back upwards

steps.step-4: Breathe in and bring your back on opposite direction

steps.step-5: Control your breathing along with the back muscles

steps.step-3: Push up your chest with your arms,face looking up

steps.step-4: Curve your back and your butt remaining steady

steps.step-5: Lie down on initial position facing ground

steps.step-2: Bring your hands above your head

steps.step-3: Bend your elbow and push back using your other arm

steps.step-4: You will feel a stretch on your tricep

steps.step-5: Repeat on the other side also
